s: This is my second nespresso, my first was the vertuo next however it was difficult to open and shut so I opted to purchase this version. The machine arrived and the box was damaged but the machine itself was in perfect condition. I would have given 5 stars, however the photos and the description state it would come with sample pods and there were none included. Compared to the price of this machine brand ...

t: Amazon.com: Nespresso VertuoPlus Coffee and Espresso Maker by Breville: Home & Kitchen
s: I bought the new Ninja espresso machine and from day 1 it was a pain in my backside. I wanted to love it and it was gorgeous, but it leaked everywhere and the espressos came out awful. I returned it and bought the Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe on a recommendation from a friend, and I am in love.
